name: Deadline Dash!
description:
A rough, single scene demo made in Ren'Py for my storytelling & narrative module. (Expected to remain a prototype only, unless I get any new ideas for it to go ahead) 

 

 

Work hard or play hard, and finish up your pitch presentation before the deadline to win your publisher’s heart and get your game out in the world.

Collaborate with your new coworkers as the new, last-minute hire to help complete their project in just two weeks. Every day counts towards your final product, and when one of your coworkers is supposedly changing things on the sly, who knows how that will pan out…?

 

 

Bond with your new coworkers. With a point system tallying your choices, the more you get along with them, the better you’ll work together on the game and its pitch.

Day-to-day life at a small office can be relaxing. Even when you’re on a deadline! There’s not much stopping you even if you choose to slack off.

Investigate those around you to uncover who the mole is. It might end up changing the game…
